Makes sense, thanks @plexus !

Let's do this then. I'll setup a new issue where we can track our contributors' agreements.

Dear esteemed Rails Girls Summer of Code contributor,

you've added a feature, fixed a bug or otherwise improved the RGSoC teams app codebase. Thanks again for that!

Unfortunately, the project is missing a proper FOSS license. We'd like to remedy that and put the code under <License we end up using> but for this, we need your help: in order to make the shift, we need you as a past contributor to agree that you license your contributions under this new license.

If you agree to it, simply put a short statement as a comment to this issue. Thank you! 😄

Comments? Any other opinions on a license?
